originalText.text: My daughter's confidence and playing abilities have really improved with Andrea! Andrea is so caring and positive, and my daughter really looks forward to her lessons and her group classes. Thank you for being such a great organization and giving kids the gift of music!

originalText.text: If you want your child to learn music in a progressive environment  Whin is the place for you. We are truly happy we found this school. My son has made not only great progress in playing the violin but he has found good friendships and a family at Whin. There is individualized attention  to every student. During the pandemic it was the only solid group my son had and it‚Äôs kept him structured. They handled remote learning better then many other organizations and my son looks forward to class all the time. I grew up believing playing an instrument  was very disciplined and always kept away from it but watching the teachers at Whin I have learned you can do both. I think the school will help my son become a well rounded musician with a passion for music. Our family is blessed to be part of the Whin family.

originalText.text:
My son Zak has been part of this wonderful music team for several years. Not only he has learned music (reading music, playing solo and as a group) but he has made many friends as well. This group is a small community that cares about each other.  They also care about issues in the community and get involved, teaching children the importance of helping each other.  If you have little or big kids remotely interested in music at any level, join them!!! You won‚Äôt regret.

text.text:
My son Zak has been part of this wonderful music team for several years. Not only has he learned music (reading music, playing alone and as a group) but he has made many friends as well. This group is a small community that cares about each other. They also care about issues in the community and get involved, teaching children the importance of helping each other. If you have little or big kids remotely interested in music at any level, join them!!! You won't regret.

My son Zak has participated in this wonderful musical group for several years. Not only has he learned music (reading it, playing alone or in a group) but he has also made many friends. This group is like a small community that cares about each other. They also care about the problems that exist in the community and are interested in helping, teaching their students the importance of helping everyone. If you have young or older children who are interested in learning music at any level, subscribe them!!! You will not regret!
